articles.title: Tesla crash that killed California motorcyclist is number 38 in wider U.S. probe
articles.description: US auto safety regulators are investigating a 2021 Tesla Model Y crash that killed a motorcyclist in California earlier this month, the latest in a broader examination of collisions suspected to involve the use of advanced driver-assistance systems.
